articles.title: Researchers race to study probiotic before white-nose syndrome spreads to B.C. bats - Toronto Star
articles.description: VANCOUVER - Researchers say a deadly fungus that has nearly wiped out a North American bat species hasn’t yet spread to British Columbia, giving them ...
articles.content: VANCOUVER - Researchers say a deadly fungus that has nearly wiped out a North American bat species hasnt yet spread to British Columbia, giving them valuable time to study whether probiotics prevent … [+4048 chars]
